trajectory.experience-1-description: I oversee the migration of legacy monolithic architectures to microservices. I manage a team of four developers, focusing on cloud-native strategies, automated testing suites, and reducing deployment overhead by 40%.
trajectory.education-1-description: Focused on hardware-software integration, distributed systems, and low-level optimization techniques.
trajectory.certificate-1-description: Validation of expertise in designing distributed systems on the AWS platform.
trajectory.course-1-description: An intensive look at CAP theorem, consensus algorithms, and fault-tolerant architecture patterns.
trajectory.course-2-description: Focusing on penetration testing, OAuth2 implementation, and securing CI/CD pipelines.
trajectory.course-3-description: Mastering concurrency patterns and memory management in the Go programming language.
trajectory.course-4-description: Bridge the gap between back-end logic and user-centric design principles.
trajectory.course-5-description: Integrating Pinecone and OpenAI APIs to build context-aware search applications.
